description: No Christmas is complete without a trifle and this one takes the cake! Fill a banana bread loaf with custard then top with cream, jelly cubes and fresh fruit.
name: Fruit-salad Trifle Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g white grapes, stalks attached, cut into small clusters

recipeInstructions.text: Using a serrated knife, cut a thin layer from top of the cake. Using a small sharp knife, cut around the inside edge of the cake. Scoop out the cake inside, leaving a 1cm-thick cake shell.
Place custard in a large jug. Sprinkle gelatine over 2 tbs boiling water. Whisk until dissolved. Pour cooled gelatine into custard. Pour custard into cake shell. Chill for 1 hour or until firm.

Line a 18cm square cake pan with baking paper. Place jelly powder in a heatproof jug. Add remaining boiling water. Mix well. Pour into the prepared pan. Chill for 2 hours or until set. Cut jelly into small cubes.
Using an electric mixer, beat cream in a large bowl until firm peaks form. Top cake with cream. Decorate with grapes, blackberries, mango and jelly cubes. Serve.
